title: WTF RITO
body:
COme on rito this happends and i got to w8  6 mins till it q up me agein this is not the firt time i need to w8 cuz of your buggs,stop adding so much new stuff 
fix old ons so we can play normaly and not get bans or w8 for q up cuz of your litel gliches or baggs 
WICTORY AGEINST ALL ADS

replies.body: This usually occurs when your client loses connection to our Server. Don't worry though, it's a quick fix if you run through the steps in our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664). That should stabilize the issue so that you don't have to deal with it again!
